PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-06822010-05-27,  ,  ,  ,  NRCAN,  NEB
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectAmending Order AO-1-GC-113 (Variance of National Energy Board Certificate GC-113)
PrecisOrder amending the Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity No. GC-113, issued to NOVA Gas Transmission Ltd., in order to authorize the removal from Schedule A of the Certificate of the Moosehorn River Sales Lateral and Moosehorn River Sales Meter Station, which were sold to Devon Canada General Partnership.
AttachmentsAttachment
